---
title: "Simulation software"
---

`ciw` is an free and open source software package for discrete-event simulation of open queuing networks. 

More information about ciw and how to build queuing network models can be found here: <https://ciw.readthedocs.io>

>  Geraint I. Palmer, Vincent A. Knight, Paul R. Harper & Asyl L. Hawa (2019) Ciw: An open-source discrete event simulation library, Journal of Simulation, 13:1, 68-82, DOI: 10.1080/17477778.2018.1473909 <https://doi.org/10.1080/17477778.2018.1473909>
